customMethods.name: buildSeries
load
customMethods.script:
# Goal: build a new datasources object along with matching series object.
	dataSources = {}
	series = []
	
	# Controlling parameters	
	dateStart = self.view.params.range.start
	dateEnd = self.view.params.range.end
	chartData = self.view.params.data
	modes = self.getModes()
	
	# Build the chart series
	series = self.getSeries(modes)
	
	# Build the chart DataSources
	dataSources = self.getDataSources(series)	
		
	# Apply the new datasources/series to the chart.
	self.props.series = series
	self.props.dataSources = dataSources

customMethods.name: unload
isPayloadInstance
customMethods.script:
# Check that the message is intended for this instance ID
	flag = False
	if payload:
		payloadInstanceID = payload['instanceID'] if 'instanceID' in payload else -1
		
		if payloadInstanceID == self.view.params.instanceID:
			flag = True
			
	return flag

customMethods.name: getModes
getSeries
customMethods.script:
# For each mode, build a new series.
	series = []
	for mode in modes:
	
		newSeriesName = mode['name'].strip() if 'name' in mode else ''
		newSeriesDatasource = mode['name'].replace(' ', '').replace('/', '').lower() if 'name' in mode else ''	
		newSeriesColor = mode['color']  if 'color' in mode else ''

		newSeries = self.buildSeries(newSeriesName, newSeriesDatasource, newSeriesColor, True)
		
		series.append(newSeries)
		
	# Build a series for the dedicated cursor.
	series.append(self.buildSeries('cursor', 'cursor', '', False))
	
	return series

customMethods.name: getDataSources
